attributes.action: withdraw all our troops from afghanistan immediately and stop being a puppet for america we cant afford this!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the financial problems we have in this country we do not need to be spending billions a year sustaining failed BUSH and PUPPET BLAIR decisions. when was the last time you heard bin laden mentioned? that was why we went there  GET OUT NOW!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
